website_summaries.verdict: Four separate pieces gives you versatility in installation and adjustments.
pros: Comes in cocoa, sage and wheat
cons: Seat cover does not stay tucked in back of the chair

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I have two Lazy Boy wall-saver recliners. It was simple to figure how to put it on. It was actually a little big for this recliner because it's not the overstuffed style. I hooked the loops on the hardware underneath the chair and that helps keep it tight. The back doesn't look as good because my chairs have a panel at the bottom that doesn't move, so the cover had to go under it. Its tight enough to stay in place. But the style is nice, the pocket and handle placement work fine. It looks just like the picture. I think it looks great for the price.If you want perfection, you'll have to spend $150 more. front & back photos
customer_reviews.author: M. Heinz

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Apply and stays put
customer_reviews.text: It took my husband and I about 30 minutes to completely cover our recliner and we have not had to adjust it at all. Our couch cover (not made or purchased on Amazon) from Bed Bath and Beyond, was over $100 dollars and is beautiful but needs to be readjusted frequently. Also the color is a little lighter than the picture, but that is ok because it is a beautful sage/ khaki mix.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria Miller

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT FIT LARGE RECLINERS
customer_reviews.text: It does not fit large recliners. There were reviews that stated it fit large recliners and while the main body pieces did fit the arms were not able to stretch. Additionally, it rips VERY easily. Any strain put on the stitching causes rips immediately. Very disappointed with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Great Cover and it looks good
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this cover before years ago then we sold the chair with the cover on it. My current chair was a pleather one and was starting to crack. This cover goes on pretty easy and looks great--just like the picture. They feel nice and soft. The only thing that is difficult is the middle piece, but it went on nicely when you first remove the back of the recliner and pull the piece on tight. Once I did that, everything has been staying in place. I love these covers much better than the one of the other that I had bought that was all one piece and just looked bad.
customer_reviews.author: Kory

customer_reviews.title: Updated review
customer_reviews.text: The day after I posted the review...the cat walked across the back of the cover. Her claws didn't just snag the material. It left giant holes at the top of the cover. It is almost like the fabric disintegrated. This makes me sad, because I was genuinely impressed with this product. I would have understood snags, but I can't understand how it made such giant holes. Covered our disgusting, ugly and outdated recliner perfectly. Saved a fortune by not having to buy a new recliner for kids game room. It has been heavily used for a few months now and still looks fine. I just occasionally have to re-tuck the seat part in neatly...which takes about ten seconds.
customer_reviews.author: DCS

customer_reviews.title: Yeah!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprisingly pleased with this cover. We have a kinda weird shaped recliner from a major furniture chain and soon after buying, the "bonded leather" ended up flaking off everywhere. The recliner still was pretty soft though, so I bought this in brown and it fit perfectly. Nice and stretchy with good coverage and wasn't too hard to wrestle on! Like the pocket in the side as well. Saved my recliner from the trash! Would definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: B.J.

customer_reviews.title: Received in good time and good condition
customer_reviews.text: Received in good time and good condition. Went on quickly. The only problem I had ( WAS NOT a real problem) was getting the seat section stretched into place. The reason I had trouble was my arthritic hands. I suggest purchaser sit down and take each piece out and study to make sure they know exactly what they have to do. As I said no problem with the product just me. I would and probably will make another purchase in the future/
customer_reviews.author: V. L. Johnstonfreese

customer_reviews.title: Recliner cover didn't last a week
customer_reviews.text: Fabrics ripped in less than a week after I put it on my chair. Extremely Dissatisfied. I paid good money for this and had to throw it away. Couldn't repair it. I even contacted several businesses to see if they could repair it for me and they said NO. I think it was cheaply made. I'll never order one with that stretch material again. They got 1 star because I had to before I post this. I didn't want to give them any
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sage Color Does Not Match Picture Color
customer_reviews.text: The Sage color I received was a washed out putty color with a minute dash of green. The picture color is shown as a vibrate green... The instructions are vague and minimal with stickers stating arm, center front and back. The four items are difficult to put on and it took two people. The fabric I received looked cheap and not the same as appeared in picture. Returned for full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flaw in Fabric/Seat Does not Stay on
customer_reviews.text: There is a very prominent flaw in the upper seat back...so when the chair is empty it is the first thing you see. I wish Amazon would have a better way to get a replacement for something like this. I don't want to send the whole thing back, I just want a new back. Also after using it for about a month, the seat back does not stay in place. The good news, the arms covers are covering up the part of the chair where the dog has jumped up and destroyed the Vinyl.
customer_reviews.author: Rod Turbot

customer_reviews.title: I bought the largest size but didn't fit.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because it looked very nice to cover my torn up recliner. However after receiving it I tried to put it on my recliner and it just would not fit. It is too late to return it or exchange it. I don't know what I would exchange it for because I got the largest size. Let me be clear. Had it fit I would keep it because of how nice it looked. It now looks like I may be selling it on eBay.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen T

customer_reviews.title: Much Too Large For Small La-Z-Boy Recliner
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping this would fit my smaller recliner but it required much tucking in and then that left puckering in places, elastic straps visible, and was very unsightly in the back. I would not recommend this product if you're hoping to still retain definition and style in your recliner. A little bit of tugging resulted in fabric ripping away from elastic. End result not at all like the smooth look that is pictured.
customer_reviews.author: KJBB

customer_reviews.title: Having this slipcover come in four pieces allowed for me to have a great fit even on the loveseat
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these as I have a double reclining loveseat. Having this slipcover come in four pieces allowed for me to have a great fit even on the loveseat. I just simply left out an arm cover from each set. I have had this on my loveseat for about a week now and have barely need to adjust it as it stays in place very well. I loved this cover so much I purchased two more for my other recliners.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Needed a cover for an inherited recliner that had seen better days. This fit was fine, but I ended up using a staple gun at the very bottom to secure. I had first tried upholstery pins, but they were not sturdy enough. For the price, I'd buy it again. Four stars out of five due to ease of snagging. Would not recommend for cat owners- go with something thicker.
customer_reviews.author: Logan Proudfoot

customer_reviews.title: Not sitting easy!
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in product. It had a seam tear on the side of cover for back. It does not fit the front part of my recliner. The legs will not come out if i attempt to cover the bottom part of front reclining part. This recliner is actually a smaller recliner. I really thought this was going to be a nice fit.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: In the beginning we loved this. It fit perfectly which is really hard ...
customer_reviews.text: In the beginning we loved this. It fit perfectly which is really hard to find. Then we washed it maybe 3 times and the cloth for the bottom is so stretched out we can no longer keep it on. Real disappointment. We would love to just buy the bottom part as the top and sides are still fine but you can't.
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: I really like the green color and material of this recliner cover
customer_reviews.text: I really like the green color and material of this recliner cover. I did find it slightly large for my recliner but so far, after tucking it in, I've had no problems with the extra material. It was easy to put on the recliner and has a lot of stretch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made in "China" shotty workmanship price was on the high side for this crap quality!
customer_reviews.text: Have 1 lazy boy 68 round back, that one fit ok, but when putting arms on, hear elastic and seem break!! Our 78 round lazy boy, its on but again arm seems with elastic week, and it barely fits! It says up to 84 round. NNOOOT. And now cant return mounted and arm tears at the elastic, since its on, nope, wont accept return, thats company not amazon! Made in "China" shotty workmanship price was on the high side for this crap quality!!
customer_reviews.author: daren v.

customer_reviews.title: Di not fit
customer_reviews.text: Even though this states it is for a "Jumbo " recliner is did not fit the recliner I have. parts fit better than others. I was not really useful for what I needed. My recliner is a larger recliner but since this said jumbo I thought it should fit. Other than the fit it was the right color, arrived on time etc. I was looking for something to protect a new recliner and the pet covers etc. said they did not stay put. I was hoping this would fit and protect but it did not work.
customer_reviews.author: T. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the Slipcover
customer_reviews.text: I needed to cover my large leather Lazy Boy rocker recliner and did not want to spent a lot of money so I bought this. I was very happy with the speed in which I received the item, first off. So we took the four pieces and directions out of the package. The color is not the emerald-ish green in the pic. It is more minty green. I like it though. And I like the diamond pattern of the material. My husband and 18 yo daughter had the chair covered in 15 minutes. I read the directions, which they really did not need. It was that easy.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri K

customer_reviews.title: Recliner Cover Good Buy for the Value
customer_reviews.text: Many of the reviews I read are spot on to what I have experienced. Took me a little time to figure out how to put each piece on. Could have easily been labeled much better. But that aside it looks very nice and I plan on ordering one in the Cocoa Color. I just hope it holds up and washes well. I am pleased with the value, price and color turned out very nice. The sage is not quite as dark as the pic reflects. I just hope it holds up and washes well. That would give it the 5th star if it washes well.
customer_reviews.author: Redheaded Hippie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: These chair covers are simply amazing! I can not believe how natural they look and they are so easy to put on. My daughter came in after I had put this on our old recliner and asked when we got the new chair. Best of all they are cheap enough a person could buy two or three colors and change them at whim!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great chair cover!
customer_reviews.text: This has to be one of my best purchases ever! I bought this to cover my recliner to preserve it from hair and scratches and such from my dog jumping on there. It's easy to put on. Very self explanatory. It fits great. It's comfortable and easy to keep clean. I have has it for a while now and it still looks nice. I love it. I definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn M. Schemenauer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice how you can take them off and wash them. Looks nice
customer_reviews.author: Mark  R. Hornbuckle

customer_reviews.title: The best cover at the best price!
customer_reviews.text: Because our recliners are smaller than most, I was hesitant to order these covers. So glad I did! This 4-piece provides the most custom fit I've ever seen and these replaced $90 slipcovers that were a such a poor fit our recliners were left looking sagging, old and worn out. These covers on the other hand provide such a great custom fit that a friend asked if we'd purchased new furniture. Just wish this 4-piece set came in more colors, including a dark burgundy and a dark chocolate. The brown and sage are both much lighter than depicted in the photos. The brown is a light, not a dark chocolate brown.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Estey

customer_reviews.title: NICE EXCEPT FOR THE SEAT COVER
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about it except for the seat, it does not stay tucked in no matter what I do. I tried putting magazines, as one person suggested, I tried a towel, nothing works. It is discouraging to have to fix the seat cover every time you get out of the chair.
customer_reviews.author: nan

customer_reviews.title: The stretch Newport Recliner cover
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is nice and quality is good. The only thing is putting on the seat cover did not work for me, the size is ok, however it cannot be tucked beneath the back rest to have the cover fold over and be tucked under the seat cushion. The arm rest and back portion of the chair fit nicely. It just wasn't made completely to fit my recliner chair.
customer_reviews.author: Florence Maruyama

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I used the seat piece on our recliner when I first got this item at the end of March. It would not stay put. When I attempted today to put the whole thing on, this item ripped (where fabric meets elastic). I did not realize that there was such a short return window either. Apparently I am out of luck on this one and out $$ too. :( poor quality. Maybe they know this.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed although I read most of the reviews and feedback ...
customer_reviews.text: It did not fit at all. Very disappointed although I read most of the reviews and feedback on how they fir large recliners, but mine is a medium-semi large size and it still didn't even fit.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Saoud

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good fit
customer_reviews.text: While putting it on, I had my doubts. It just didn't seem like it would stretch over the arms. There are stretchy things on each corner and they allow you to pull the fabric and wrap it around something. Surprisingly it fit very well. I have a 1998 Best Chair, Inc recliner that measures under the stated max measurements.
customer_reviews.author: DOK

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic slipcover
customer_reviews.text: I just bought a new recliner, but need to cover it up because of my cats. This cover is perfect! It looks exactly like the picture. It took my daughter and I about 20 minutes to figure out all the pieces and how to put them on, but next time I'm sure it will be a snap. Great that you can take off just one or two parts to wash if you need to. Have not washed it yet... will update when I do. Am now looking to purchase similar covers for sofa and loveseat!
customer_reviews.author: Birdy

customer_reviews.title: This works great! It fits great and stays put
customer_reviews.text: This works great! It fits great and stays put. It does hold onto dog hair, but a quick vaccum solves it fine. I wish there was a larger selection of colors so that it would cordinate better with my couch.
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: The covers were great and fitted the standard electric chair my father uses ...
customer_reviews.text: The covers were great and fitted the standard electric chair my father uses really well. They come in 4 pieces and are stickered so that you can put them on the chair with ease. The fabric looks good and the colour wheat is a lovely taupe colour. There is also a pocket on the right hand side to hold TV remote controls etc and also to clip the electric remote onto. Very pleased with the product and I shall be ordering another one soon. The material looks nice and stretches well over the chair. Very good value for the price and much cheaper than re-upholstering!!! I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs D.

customer_reviews.title: I had these covers for three years.
customer_reviews.text: I brought two of these for my sectional with recliners on the ends. They have lasted three years through many washings two dogs two cats pluss my family with daily use. I am just now replacing them. Like others the seat cover would not stay in place. I fixed this problem by folding thin elastic in half creating a loop. I hand sewed them to the back part of seat covers. I then attached them to cup hooks that I placed under the chair. As for vacuuming dog hair off, don't vacuum back and forth only vacuum in one direction.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am pleased that I was able to use the middle sections
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a recliner that I knew would be a challenge to cover. I am pleased that I was able to use the middle sections. It was easy to put on and the pattern is subtle.
customer_reviews.author: OctoLegato

customer_reviews.title: To bad it doesn't stay on like that
customer_reviews.text: It looks exactly as shown. To bad it doesn't stay on like that!! The seat part rolls off. It comes in 4 different parts that in no way can be attached to one another. Instructions tell you to use magazines to keep it from rolling up. To bad you have to buy it and then find out. Just a big waste.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma6

customer_reviews.title: I liked the color and it fits very well otherwise
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion, a couple of things could be improved upon. The instructions do not tell you how to secure the back cover. The side panel and the back panel do not meld well together when slipping it over the bottom leg of the rocker. Also the seat cover doesn't stay tucked in by the back of the chair. I ended up sewing some elastic on the corners of the seat/leg rest cover and securing them on the bottom leg as well. I liked the color and it fits very well otherwise. I hope they wash up good and hold their shape.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Schlenker

customer_reviews.title: Seat did not fit
customer_reviews.text: Good quality . Three of the four pieces fit well. The third, the seat, was three inches short and useless. I have a standard Lazyboy chair.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Minnie

customer_reviews.title: Way to small, even for a SMALL chair
customer_reviews.text: This cover is way to small. I read reviews before purchasing anything on Amazon and most of the reviews said fit big chairs and I felt comfortable buying this as our chair is smaller. The cover doesn't even fit the actual seat part you sit in!! Very unsatisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: ABritt2K15

customer_reviews.title: It didn't look as smooth and nice as the picture
customer_reviews.text: It looked silly on my recliner. It didn't look as smooth and nice as the picture. It was quite the challenge to get it on right. The area in the back that is not covered up by the cover looked really silly.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Graham

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to buying new chair, needs to be larger
customer_reviews.text: This product was a good quality and the color was nice. I would say it is a great alternative to purchasing an entirely new chair. The only issue I had with this item was that it simply did not fit my large recliner no matter how much I stretched it.
customer_reviews.author: charity james

customer_reviews.title: Super easy
customer_reviews.text: When you get this it's so tiny and you think it'll never fit on that chair, but it really stretches and it only took me about five minutes to get it on. I like it a lot, and believe it was well worth the money invested. It was not that expensive so I won't feel bad if I have to replace it or choose to go with a different color, but it seems to be pretty durable so I think it'll last a while.
customer_reviews.author: Olympic Peninsula Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Simply perfect
customer_reviews.text: This chair cover does exactly what i need it to do, which is cover my recliner. I live in a dorm room that came with a recliner chair, but the germ-a-phobe in me would not allow myself to sit in it. Now I can comfortably relax in my chair without worrying or feeling icky. Fit pretty snug for the most part. The bottom by the foot is a little droopy, but it's not a major issue for me.
customer_reviews.author: Radiance79

customer_reviews.title: Fits Perfect
customer_reviews.text: When we received this slipcover my husband put it on our recliner before I got home. It fit our recliner perfectly. I didn't realize when I purchased it that it was 4 pieces. I have bought covers in the past and it was one piece which was hard to cover. The one thing I will say is the Sage color looked darker online. It is a lighter green than actually pictured but I love the fit and the price was right.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: The seat doesn't fit like it is suppose to but I don't care it ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to cover a new leather chair to protect it from one of my dogs who likes to jump on furniture. The seat doesn't fit like it is suppose to but I don't care it does the job. The back fits perfectly. The arms do not stretch down far enough in the front to cover all of the leg but that is ok with me the cover is doing it's job of protecting the new chair.
customer_reviews.author: Linda L. Dias

customer_reviews.title: Finally, the Right Size!
customer_reviews.text: After many times trying to find a cover to fit my over-sized recliner, this one was it! Putting it on was challenging at first, but being able to stretch the fabric to each part of the chair was key. Will probably order another one in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Smiled

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad, Still had to make some alterations but it works!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so the good news is that the material is made of a nice fabric but the one size fits all is not the case. We are keeping it as we had to make some additional alterations to fit our recliner. The pocket on the side is a nice add on that can hold the remotes or glasses or papers. Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.author: Nor'easter

customer_reviews.title: Stretches well to my lift recliner
customer_reviews.text: It looks good once all the panels are aligned and snug. Overall, it stretches well to my lift recliner. There was a 1/4 inch rip in the seam, which didn't made me send back. And, that didn't seem worth the hassle to return . Eventually, I will stitch up with needle and thread. Ends of sides and foot rest have cinching tie us but I'd have to insert hooks on my recliner's wood frame to use them for securing those panels. For now, no strings attached (pun).
customer_reviews.author: Arnel P. Cortez

customer_reviews.title: its a nice fabric, although it is supposed to be for ...
customer_reviews.text: its a nice fabric, although it is supposed to be for a large recliner, i really had to stretch it. it looks very good.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: This slipcover is nothing like description. It did not fit correctly-it wouldnt even ...
customer_reviews.text: This slipcover is nothing like description. It did not fit correctly-it wouldnt even fit to cover the back and we have a very small wall-saver recliner
customer_reviews.author: lindsey scott

customer_reviews.title: Fits well...
customer_reviews.text: This thing went right on my recliner no problem and it was like new. I would go five stars, but the material is just sort of meh...I mean, it is acceptable and probably it is just the nature of the beast, i.e. it has to be stretchy stuff, but it is not the plush stuff like the sure fit covers we recently got for our sofa and love seat. But, for the cost a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Faja4x

customer_reviews.title: For the price it's not bad. Color is a little drab I was hoping ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price it's not bad. Color is a little drab I was hoping it would be a little bit deeper. And if you sit it in a lot it does have a tendency to pull out from the crevices. So you're always having to kind of wrangle it back in.
customer_reviews.author: domenica

customer_reviews.title: Ok product
customer_reviews.text: It was very difficult to get these slipcovers on my recliners. It took my daughter and me at least 2 hours to get it figured out how to anchor the different parts. I may have gotten the wrong covers for my chairs, but the style in the description was that of my chairs. It will be very difficult to take them off to wash and then to put them back on.
customer_reviews.author: Snickers

customer_reviews.title: Good product but runs small
customer_reviews.text: Material is not the best but provides good coverage. Im not sure if it will last long so wouldnt try to wash it bery often. Also the size is not that accurate. Maybe is the shape of my recliner but runs small in the lower back side.
customer_reviews.author: Raquel

customer_reviews.title: We have a LaZ Boy Gibson reclina rocker (recliner), ...
customer_reviews.text: We have a LaZ Boy Gibson reclina rocker (recliner), this cover fits the top and the seat quite well but it's way too big on the foot part that pops up in the reclining position leaving a heap of fabric hanging on the floor. It does the job of protecting the recliner though despite looking sloppy.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: Great Recliner Cover
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy that this cover fits so well! Unlike our last cover that was just one piece, this cover has four pieces (back, seat and arms), and each piece fit perfectly on our recliner/rocker.
customer_reviews.author: Quaintly Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great!
customer_reviews.text: I covered my ladies wine colored recliner with the camel colored cover and put in my son's room. It was a little large but just pulled the elastic straps under the chair to the front legs. Worked great. Looks great. Feels great!
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Nice cover
customer_reviews.text: Very nice soft material. Needed to stretch a lot to get on recliner. Mine is an older small Lazy Boy. Do have to readjust it weekly to keep arm covers from riding up between seat and arm rest.
customer_reviews.author: T.M.H

customer_reviews.title: Dont waist you'er money.
customer_reviews.text: Made poorly,want stay on chair,I have a real small lazyboy recliner,want stay on seat part.Dont waist you'er money.
customer_reviews.author: sassygirl2.0

customer_reviews.title: so so
customer_reviews.text: its much harder to put on then you would think. the bottom seat cover is always coming off, and there is a huge hole around the foot rest handle bar. It works well enough that we can keep it on to keep the pet hair off and take it off when company is coming over, but I wouldnt count on this for everyday use
customer_reviews.author: Christina D

customer_reviews.title: and I like that there are four separate pieces instead of the ...
customer_reviews.text: No product should come in the package with holes on seams of two pieces. The cover fits my small chair well, and I like that there are four separate pieces instead of the typical one-piece unit. And, the cover worked well for my recliner which has a power button instead of a lever for lifting. But I shouldn't have to make repairs or go through the hassle of returns in hopes of getting a better product. Be forewarned.
customer_reviews.author: Jude

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it, turned my old pinkish-colored recliner into a nice tan one.
customer_reviews.author: Karma

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to recovering a chair!
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to install on our old lazy boy chair. It fits nice and feels good to the touch. It fits well and looks like it is the chair’s cover.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Hermanny

customer_reviews.title: ... ones so know they will fit well and look good. I like the fact that there are separate ...
customer_reviews.text: Haven't washed and put these on my recliners yet but they are the SAME as my prior green ones so know they will fit well and look good. I like the fact that there are separate pieces and this product is not just 1 piece.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Holding up well
customer_reviews.text: I order this slipcover after reading lots of reviews. I still had doubts, however, once it was on ( needed help with that) it stays fairly well tucked and is holding up well so far. For the price it is well worth it. It looks nice and i use it in my office which sees many different people using it.
customer_reviews.author: Kary L

customer_reviews.title: Looks great! Just like the photo
customer_reviews.text: Looks great! Just like the photo. My chair's upholstery was worn out and looked awful, but it was still structurally sturdy with a lifting motor for my dad. This cover solved the problem. I couldn't recommend it more.
customer_reviews.author: Spunkychk

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This cover fit perfectly. My recyliner look awesome now. I do recommend for those looking for a cover.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Dagrin

customer_reviews.title: Stretch Sensations Recliner Slipcover
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of back problems and have to sleep in my recliner at night. I also spend much of my daytime hours in it. I love my chair but it was getting some stains from coffee and meals that wouldn't come off. I decided to try this slipcover and suddenly I have a new-looking chair. It fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Arnett

customer_reviews.title: Recliner Cover.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice cover, not the best quality of material and not an exact fit, but I knew there would be some things that didn't match. But it will service my needs. I don't think you would go wrong with one like this.
customer_reviews.author: Al C.

customer_reviews.title: The cover is soft and has stayed on nicely. The color is different than the brown pictured ...
customer_reviews.text: It fit my recliner for the most part. The cover is soft and has stayed on nicely. The color is different than the brown pictured though. It is a very light brown, almost little purplish. It looks better than the original color of my recliner though, so I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: I don't have a large recliner by any means and the seat portion is too short. The material seems to collect every type of fiber and hair possible as well. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: PolishedCalla

customer_reviews.title: stretch sensations Newport recliner stretch slip cover.
customer_reviews.text: I spent a great deal of time researching recliner slip covers. Based on reviews I decided to purchase stretch sensations Newport recliner. I was disappointed that the product arrived damaged. It also did not fit. Needless to say It was returned. Some reviewers speak well of the product, however it did not work out for me at all.
customer_reviews.author: negus

customer_reviews.title: cheap and way too large
customer_reviews.text: cheap thin, stretchy fabric. Excessive fabric as it is way too big. May work for a huge chair. Mine is a barcalounger recliner. Makes chair look cheap too. Chair looks better w/ cracked leather and stuffing coming out then w/ this on it. Color is not as described or pictured.. It is a pale green.
customer_reviews.author: ricochet

customer_reviews.title: Four pieces  you don't have to use the arm pieces.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the product. My recliner has wooden arms, and this came in four pieces. Very pleases
customer_reviews.author: ingrid holz

customer_reviews.title: The arms were impossible to get on, they were ...
customer_reviews.text: The arms were impossible to get on, they were way too small for our average sized recliner. Had to send back.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Nice snug fit
customer_reviews.text: Fits nice looks nice. All the pieces look like they will stay in place while in use. Only thing I couldnt figure out was how to attach the back under the bottom to stay in place on my chair. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: danielle

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, awesome, it just fitted perfect to my recliner. The color and the fabric were just as described. I'm very grateful for the experience.
customer_reviews.author: Nilza

customer_reviews.title: Nice Covers, Fast Service
customer_reviews.text: These were shipped quickly. One is just slightly too big for our smaller recliner. The other fits perfectly, but we couldn't figure out how to fix it with all of the loops instead of ties and it was difficult getting it on because we have recliners where the back slides off, so we had to modify that part. Still, they are very nice covers, and we are happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: A. Reser

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: really nice fabric, instructions to install not great and as a result I don't think it fits real well
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: It feels great, it just doesn't fit my chair at all
customer_reviews.text: My chair is the exact one in the picture. I got the green cover. It feels great, it just doesn't fit my chair at all... It's like a piece or two were missing...
customer_reviews.author: Sheena

customer_reviews.title: Great, soft and comfy covers!!
customer_reviews.text: This cover really does the trick. I purchased 2 of these for our deteriorating lounge chairs. The fabric is soft and stretchy. If you use it correctly, which is fairly easy, it will stay on and will not slip off. The color looks great and you can toss it into the washer. Easy to use and great cover.
customer_reviews.author: JH888

customer_reviews.title: Great affordable solution
customer_reviews.text: I have a great lazy boy but did not match my furniture. This cover was easy to install and has stayed fitted 2 months in. Also is washable which has been a bonus. I had a great chair and now it matches
customer_reviews.author: johnnyboy

customer_reviews.title: Spend the money and buy a 1-piece cover.
customer_reviews.text: This fits badly and fits worse after washing. Spend the money and buy a 1-piece cover.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Fox Hall

customer_reviews.title: Fixed my problem
customer_reviews.text: We had a faux leather recliner that started to peel. The chair was only a few years old so it still works great. This cover comes in 4 parts. So much easier to put on the chair than the one piece ones. Stretchy material is nice to work with and looks pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: momsmit

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I can take it off and wash and its like new again
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A Smith

customer_reviews.title: It is ok
customer_reviews.text: This cover fits very well my recliner. I like the fact it has a bag on one side to put a book or something. It's very light weight. I just gave it 4 stars because the color is lighter than in the picture and I was looking for a darker color. But in general the cover is ok
customer_reviews.author: Cona

customer_reviews.title: Awefull!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed, very poor quality, and stretched out in one week and wouldn't stay on the chair. It looked old and worn after 1 week.
customer_reviews.author: ji

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit...Not the color I ordered!
customer_reviews.text: As fat as fit, it fits perfectly! I did roll up some magazines to keep the seat cover from rolling up. The reason I did 4 stars and not 5 is because I received the wrong color. I ordered cocoa and got wheat. Lucky, for me it still matches my other furniture. I will be ordering one more and maybe this time I will get the correct color!
customer_reviews.author: SF

customer_reviews.title: Nice Recliner Cover
customer_reviews.text: I have a pretty big recliner and this cover fits perfect I love it. The only reason why I'm giving it 4 stars instead of 5 is because the color is a little different than what I expected. Its not brown like the picture it looks kinda dull. But still a nice cover it goes on easily and fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: fabric was not the best quality, snagged and some things stuck to it ...
customer_reviews.text: It fit on the chair very well, fabric was not the best quality, snagged and some things stuck to it but overall it worked.
customer_reviews.author: dana miller

customer_reviews.title: There was no way to attach the back and bottom ...
customer_reviews.text: There was no way to attach the back and bottom to back seat of the chair. Covers stays crumpled up all the time so that the original covering of chair is exposed.
customer_reviews.author: Always pleased

customer_reviews.title: color great fit poor
customer_reviews.text: Worst fit ever for my recliner chair, I made several attempts to get the cover the fit the leg pull out without any luck and gave up...I was not a good idea it would have been helpful if there were dimension on how the chair would fit.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A. Tierney

customer_reviews.title: This fit our chair very nicely and I love the way it looks but the ...
customer_reviews.text: This fit our chair very nicely and I love the way it looks but the quality is not very good. We've only had it on the chair for a few days and it's already pilling just from our small dog walking on it when he gets on the chair to sleep. We were planning on ordering these for all of our living furniture but unfortunately it won't hold up to our dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice look
customer_reviews.text: I love the fit. My only issue with the cover is that I can't get the seat part to stay in place
customer_reviews.author: angie

customer_reviews.title: WASTE OF MONEY
customer_reviews.text: This ripped the first time we tried to put it on, also there are gaps where the cover doesn't stretch enough around the arms, there are gaps in the back between the back section and the two arm sections, there is a big "stretch" hole around the recliner lever, and it will not stay in place. WASTE OF MONEY.
customer_reviews.author: beccasue_22

customer_reviews.title: There may be something more I can do to get it to fit better. I just don't know what that is
customer_reviews.text: It fits over my recliner but doesn't stay tucked in. There may be something more I can do to get it to fit better. I just don't know what that is.
customer_reviews.author: a2zme

customer_reviews.title: THis has been a good cover to us but I definitely didn’t fit very ...
customer_reviews.text: THis has been a good cover to us but I definitely didn’t fit very well. And our recliner is just a small basic recliner.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Thacker

customer_reviews.title: Holding up great
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. It's holding up and staying put. I noticed dog hair isn't sticking to it as much as the rest of my covers. It is a little red tinted tho... wasn't to happy about that. So only 4 stars because of the odd tint.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Applebaugh

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great item!!!!!!works well 4 me I was a little apprehensive at 1st....but now I have had it for about 2 months & is fine.....but I haven't tried to was t yet...We will have to see what happens then....I will try 2 update then.....
customer_reviews.author: Rodger B. Terrey

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as the first one I received seat cover doesn't stay one
customer_reviews.author: andrew Micklos

product_meta.title: Stretch Sensations, Newport Recliner Slipcover, Standard Recliners, Perfect Chair Protection, Comfortable and Easy Stretch Fabric (Wheat)
product_meta.description:
Color:Wheat STRETCH SENSATIONS 

Stretch slipcovers are the perfect way to renew, restyle and refresh your furniture. On and off in a flash. 5-minute instant makeover. More economical than reupholstering. Quick room transformation. 

NEWPORT RECLINER SLIPCOVER, STANDARD RECLINERS, PERFECT CHAIR PROTECTION 

Stretch to fit product, fits most average sized recliners up to 82-circumference (around back of recliner) one pocket on left side, right side has opening to accommodate handle. 4-pieces 1) right arm cover 2) left arm cover 3) back cover 4) foot rest cover. Seat width of 23 in. (left to right) with a seat depth of 24 in. (front to back). 

Easy to put on, comes with a covered elastic band on the bottom that keeps it neat, just tuck any extra fabric into the seat seams for a custom look. 

Try the entire line of Stretch Sensations Today!
feature_bullets: NEWPORT REGULAR SLIPCOVER: Stretch slipcovers are the perfect way to renew, restyle and refresh your furniture. On and off in a flash. 5-minute instant makeover. More economical than reupholstering. Quick room transformation

REGULAR FIT: Stretch to fit product, fits most average sized recliners up to 82-circumference (around back of recliner) one pocket on left side, right side has opening to accommodate handle. 4-pieces 1) right arm cover 2) left arm cover 3) back cover 4) foot rest cover. Seat width of 23 in. (left to right) with a seat depth of 24 in. (front to back)
EASY STRETCH: Easy to put on, comes with a covered elastic band on the bottom that keeps it neat, just tuck any extra fabric into the seat seams for a custom look
INSTANT COMFORT: Soft material allows for perfect home comfort on your favorite chair. This product is 100% polyester. It is easy to wash, simply machine wash, tumble dry low
IDEAL PROTECTION: Ideal way to protect furniture from pets, kids, and all of life's spills

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars853 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
